The Faraone Lab integrates chemical ecology, sensory neurobiology, and sustainable vector management to develop innovative solutions for tick-borne disease prevention. Our work spans molecular mechanisms, behaviour, and translational applications, creating a vertically integrated research program from discovery to deployment.
